Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
This package provides classes to do pathfinding over a graph.

    AStar.SearchMode
     
    Navigatable
    Describes a graph-like structure that can be navigated by a pathfinder.
    Pathfinder
    Common interface for pathfinding.
    SimpleNavGraph
    This class is provides an implementation of Navigatable that facilitates pathfinding over a 3D-surface defined by a surface-mesh with obstacles.
